description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2i9s4","text":"The objective of this protocol is to digest the mouse lungs to perform scRNA analyses","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Human BioMolecular Atlas Program (HuBMAP) Method Development Community

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"fdart","text":"Lung Tissue Dissociation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1bsg3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"461a8","text":"Materials, Equipment \u0026 Reagents including Formulations","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":54}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cikpl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2geb9","text":"Liberase: (Cat# 5401127001; Roche)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1s9k","text":"DNase I (Cat# 4380-096-06; R\u0026D)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54amj","text":"3. Serum free DMEM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fhm5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c35ot","text":"5. Disposables:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9g2k","text":"i) C-tubes for GentleMACS (Cat# 130-093-237, Miltenyi Biotec)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ktj4","text":"ii) MACS SmartStrainers 70µm (Cat# 130-098-462, Miltenyi Biotec)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5vrcd","text":"iii) Sterile serological pipets; 50, 25,10, 5, 2, 1 mL size","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"t5bu","text":"iv) Sterile pipet tips; 1000, 200 and 20 μl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9nbcp","text":"v) Sterile 15mL or 50mL conical polypropylene tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7df67","text":"vi) Test tube racks for 15mL or 50mL conical tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cu8o6","text":"vii) LD columns (Cat# 130-042-901; Miltenyi Biotec)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jmqh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"57cf5","text":"6. Equipment:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qfvs","text":"i) GentleMACS Tissue Octo Dissociator (Miltenyi Biotec Inc San Diego, CA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1em0c","text":"ii) MACSmix tube rotator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93vl1","text":"iii) Table Top Centrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmcv0","text":"iv) Biological Safety Cabinet, Class II","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejmnl","text":"v) Dissecting forceps and scalpel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahc71","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djlcn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2aiaj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7ucpa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7bi93","text":"Immediately transfer the tubes to MACS Tissue Dissociator and run user-defined program named m_lung_01_02 for mouse lungs and m_heart_01.01 for mouse heart.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1brcf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5spq1","text":"1)    Mince tissue finely, place into 50ml GentleMACS C-tube with liberase enzymatic cocktail  a.     For 50mg tissue use 0.5 ml liberase + 2ml DMEM + 2ul 5 unit/ul DNase I)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4gs5l","text":"Thereafter, place 50ml conical with digestion into an incubating rocker for 30 minutes at 37 degrees C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31qlh","text":"NOTE: If you still see chunks of lung tissue in the tubes after this step then transfer to the MACS Tissue Dissociator and run user-defined program named m_lung_02_01 for mouse lungs for 10-15 sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fb2kv","text":"Remove conical from rocker and strain the cell suspension through 70 micron into 50mL tube ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fo5n4","text":"Add 3 ml DMEM (10% FBS) through the strainer to collect the remaining cell suspension","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"14jmi","text":"After straining, centrifuge at 300g for 5 minutes at 4degree C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"44g6r","text":"Remove supernatant, add 500 µl of red blood cell lysis to cell pellet. Incubate the cell suspension on ice for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"t8hq","text":"After incubation add 4.5 mL of DMEM (10% FBS) to the suspension and centrifuge at 300g for 5 minutes at 4degree C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2r1up","text":"Remove supernatant, re-suspend pellet in 2 mL DMEM (10%FBS)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"evvq6","text":"Count cells and viability using AO/PI method, confirm reading under microscope","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"r3ni","text":"Submitted the digested suspension to the Genomic Research Center for scRNA seq analyses","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bhcn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ed7ge","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Mouse Lung Digestion
